action.action-desc: Mr. Braley of Iowa introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the authority of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide specially adapted housing assistance to individuals residing temporarily in housing owned by a family member.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Andrew Connolly Veterans’ Housing Act.

section.header: Extension of authority of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide specially adapted housing assistance to individuals residing temporarily in housing owned by a family member
section.text: Section 2102A of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking December 31, 2011 and inserting December 31, 2016.
